home.title: Manufacturer and exporter of frozen and dried products
home.sec_title: We produce and export high-quality frozen and dried berries, fruits, mushrooms and vegetables
home.desc_seo: Wholesale frozen and dried berries, fruits, mushrooms, and veggies from Ukraine. High-quality natural products. Export to the EU and worldwide.

about_us.title: We are a family-owned private company specializing in the processing, production, and export of frozen and dried berries, fruits, mushrooms, and vegetables since 2010. All our products are grown and harvested exclusively in the environmentally clean regions of Ukraine

contacts.address: Central street, 34B, Vilkhivtsi village, Tyachiv district, Transcarpathian region, Ukraine, 90542
contacts.name: Name

ourCertificates.desc: We adhere to the highest safety and quality standards, confirmed by our HACCP and Organic certificates. Our products are made from carefully selected raw materials and undergo multi-stage control at every stage of production. These international certifications ensure that our berries, fruits, and vegetables are natural, safe, and fully compliant with the requirements of organic production.

product_page.frozenBilberriesDesc: IQF frozen bilberries for industrial processing and export. Wild-harvested, hand-picked berries with natural color, flavor, and nutrients preserved.
product_page.frozenLingonberriesDesc: IQF frozen lingonberries for industrial processing and export. Wild-harvested, hand-picked berries with natural color, flavor, and nutrients preserved.
product_page.frozenRosehipsDesc: IQF frozen rosehips for industrial processing and export. Wild-harvested, hand-picked fruits with natural color, flavor, and nutrients preserved.
product_page.frozenPlumsDesc: IQF frozen plums for industrial processing and export. Ripe, hand-selected fruits with natural color, flavor, and nutrients preserved.
product_page.driedPlumsDesc: Dried plums for industrial processing and export. Sweet, pitted fruits with preserved natural flavor, aroma, and nutritional value.
product_page.prunesDesc: Premium prunes for industrial processing and export. Sweet, tender dried plums with rich flavor, dark color, and extended shelf life.
product_page.frozenElderberriesDesc: IQF frozen elderberries for industrial processing and export. Wild dark berries with preserved color, tart flavor, and high antioxidant content.
product_page.frozenStrawberryDesc: IQF frozen strawberries for industrial processing and export. Ripe, hand-selected berries with preserved color, aroma, and natural sweetness.
product_page.frozenRaspberryDesc: IQF frozen raspberries for industrial processing and export. Hand-picked ripe berries with vibrant color, rich flavor, and ideal texture preserved.
product_page.frozenApricotDesc: IQF frozen apricots for industrial processing and export. Ripe, pitted fruits with preserved color, aroma, and tender texture.
product_page.frozenRedBellPeppersDesc: IQF frozen red bell peppers for industrial processing and export. Cleaned, sliced peppers with preserved color, sweetness, and firm texture.
product_page.frozenGreenBellPeppersDesc: IQF frozen green bell peppers for industrial processing and export. Diced or sliced peppers with preserved color, texture, and mild flavor.
product_page.frozenYellowBellPeppersDesc: IQF frozen yellow bell peppers for industrial processing and export. Cut peppers with vivid color, mild sweetness, and smooth texture preserved.
product_page.frozenMixedBellPeppersDesc: IQF frozen mixed bell peppers for industrial processing and export. Colorful blend of peppers with preserved color, sweetness, and texture.
product_page.frozenPorciniMushroomsDesc: IQF frozen porcini mushrooms for industrial processing and export. Wild mushrooms with rich flavor, firm texture, and natural aroma preserved.
product_page.freshPorciniMushroomsDesc: Fresh porcini mushrooms for industrial processing and export. Wild boletus with rich flavor, firm texture, and premium quality.
product_page.driedPorciniMushroomsDesc: Dried porcini mushrooms for industrial processing and export. Wild boletus with intense aroma, rich flavor, and long shelf life.
product_page.freshChanterellesDesc: Fresh chanterelles for industrial processing and export. Wild mushrooms with delicate aroma, firm texture, and premium quality.
product_page.driedChanterellesDesc: Dried chanterelles for industrial processing and export. Wild mushrooms with rich aroma, earthy flavor, and long shelf life.
product_page.frozenSourCherriesDesc: IQF frozen sour cherries for industrial processing and export. Pitted cherries with rich color, tangy flavor, and juicy texture preserved.
product_page.frozenHoneyMushroomsDesc: IQF frozen honey mushrooms for industrial processing and export. Wild mushrooms with firm texture, natural color, and mild flavor preserved.
product_page.frozenBlackberriesDesc: IQF frozen blackberries for industrial processing and export. Wild berries with preserved color, sweet-tart flavor, and juicy texture.
product_page.frozenGrapesDesc: IQF frozen grapes for industrial processing and export. Seedless grapes with preserved sweetness, firm texture, and bright color.
product_page.frozenCornDesc: IQF frozen sweet corn for industrial processing and export. Tender kernels with preserved color, sweetness, and firm texture.
product_page.frozenBlackCurrantsDesc: IQF frozen black currants for industrial processing and export. Wild berries with rich color, tart flavor, and high vitamin C content.
